Class ChronologicalPostListWidget

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.server.widgets.AbstractWidget
      • com.communote.server.widgets.AbstractMultipleResultWidget<I>

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PagedWidget<NoteData>, RssSupportWidget, Widget

    public class ChronologicalPostListWidget
extends AbstractPagedListWidget<NoteData>
implements RssSupportWidget
    Widget for displaying a list of blog posts.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/
